title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s core CLI and server that lets you pull, run and chat with GGUF models locally; includes a Go API and built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical endpoints to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; supports multi-user, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama with conversation history, model switching and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private code completion.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin and Scala friendly, supports streaming chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; shows ingestion and Q&A in ~100 lines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that uses Ollama models as generators and embedders for production pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image (GPU & CPU) with one-liner to run Ollama in a container.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; supports slash-commands and per-guild model choice.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads answers from Ollama; mentions or emoji trigger the bot.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama inside no-code workflows; chat, generate and embed blocks.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client crate for Ollama; serde-powered types and streaming chat via tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with Unity examples; supports chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper that exposes Ollama as a GenServer for fault-tolerant local LLM calls in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that talks to Ollama; includes session memory and model selector widgets.
